xal.tools.math

Class OpenInterval

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.tools.math.Interval
      • xal.tools.math.OpenInterval
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OpenInterval
extends Interval
    Represents an open interval of the real line.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
